entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Midland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:43 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
